mapper.sql: Num, EngineModel, displacement, AirIntakeForm, CylinderArrangement, NumberOfCylinders, NumberOfValvesPerCylinder, CompressionRatio, DistributionAgency, TheCylinderDiameter, trip, MaximumHorsepower, MaximumPower, MaximumPowerRpm, MaximumN_m, MaximumRpm, CVVT, FuelForm, FuelLabel, OilSupplyWay, CylinderHeadMaterial, CylinderBodyMaterial, EnvironmentalProtectionStandard
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from engine
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into engine (Num, EngineModel, displacement, AirIntakeForm, CylinderArrangement, NumberOfCylinders, NumberOfValvesPerCylinder, CompressionRatio, DistributionAgency, TheCylinderDiameter, trip, MaximumHorsepower, MaximumPower, MaximumPowerRpm, MaximumN_m, MaximumRpm, CVVT, FuelForm, FuelLabel, OilSupplyWay, CylinderHeadMaterial, CylinderBodyMaterial, EnvironmentalProtectionStandard) values (#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enginemodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airintakeform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cylinderarrangement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberofcylinders,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberofvalvespercylinder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compressionratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionagency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thecylinderdiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maximumhorsepower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maximumpower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maximumpowerrpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maximumn_m,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maximumrpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cvvt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuelform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuellabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilsupplyway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cylinderheadmaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cylinderbodymaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{environmentalprotectionstandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update engine
EngineModel = #{enginemodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
displacement = #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AirIntakeForm = #{airintakeform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CylinderArrangement = #{cylinderarrangement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NumberOfCylinders = #{numberofcylinders,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NumberOfValvesPerCylinder = #{numberofvalvespercylinder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

trip = #{trip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MaximumPower = #{maximumpower,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where Num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
